longMSG:
You are in the DINING ROOM on the 1st floor. The table is set.
There is a DINING TABLE, CHAIRS, and a CHINA CABINET.
You may go EAST to the LIVING ROOM on the 1st floor, or go WEST to the KITCHEN on the 1st floor.
shortMSG:
You are in a DINING ROOM on the 1st floor.
Features: DINING TABLE, CHAIRS, CHINA CABINET
 Areas you may go to:
EAST/LIVING ROOM
WEST/KITCHEN
